Kirundi_Transcription: Yarâmpévye, nôné ubu dukūndana na nyéne inzu abamwó.

English_Translation: He dumped me, but now I'm in a relationship with the landlord of his apartment.

English_Translation: He threw the ball the second time

Kirundi_Transcription: Yavuze ivy’ukuzuka kwa Kristo abibonye bitaribwabe , yukw atarekewe mu kuzimu, kandi n’umubiri wiwe ata ho wigeze ubora
French_Translation: Il a parlé de la résurrection du Christ, la voyant avant qu'elle ne se produise, qu'il ne serait pas laissé dans la fosse et que son corps ne se décomposerait jamais.
English_Translation: He spoke of the resurrection of Christ, seeing it before it ever happened , that he would not be left in the pit, and his body that it would never decay
He said that he will come

Kirundi_Transcription: Yemwe bana! ni mureke gutera amabuye!

Kirundi_Transcription: Yesu ni we Mwami wa bose
French_Translation: Jésus est le Seigneur de tous

Kirundi_Transcription: Yihereranye ni abiwe bigishwa akabibasobanurira vyose
French_Translation: Lorsqu'il était seul avec ses propres disciples, il leur expliquait tout.
English_Translation: When he was alone with his own disciples he explained everything to them
He would have had to speak

Kirundi_Transcription: Yofashe kw izosi, impene iba ipfuye

Kirundi_Transcription: Yohana amaze gushirwa mw ibohero, Yesu aja i Galilaya
French_Translation: Quand Jean fut mis en prison, Jésus se rendit en Galilée
English_Translation: When John had been put in prison, Jesus went to Galilee

French_Translation: S'il me l'avait dit, je serais venu
English_Translation: If he had told me, I would have come

French_Translation: Il y est retourné une deuxième fois et a prié
